page.title: 14FAMILY QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content:
A LIST OF QUESTIONS ABOUT FAMILY LIFE WAS SENT OUT TO SOME FAMILIES. THIS IS THE REPLY FROM ONE OF THEM.
{NAMES}NICHOLAS KINGSBURY (35) JANE (40) ZARA (9) PATRICK (6) ALEXANDER (4) {HOUSE }RENAISSANCE, 31 WEST DRIVE, CALDECOTE {HOW LONG HERE} 2 YEARS {WORK }NICK WORKS AS A LECTURER AT TRINITY COLLEGE AND THE UNIVERSITY ENGINEERING DEPARTMENT. HE IS A CONSULTANT FOR MARCONI IN PORTSMOUTH. HE DRIVES TO WORK IN A CAR. JANE IS A HOUSEWIFE AND MUM. SHE IS ALSO A DINNER LADY AND ASSISTANT TO NICK. SOMETIMES SHE TEACHES. SHE WALKS, CYCLES OR DRIVES TO WORK. ZARA, PATRICK AND ALEX GO TO SCHOOL. THEY WALK OR CYCLE. {CONT PAGE 15}
